dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, B, you will *not* believe this story I read. It's, uh, quite a ride.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, B, you will not believe this story I read. It's, uh, quite a ride.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, I'm ready. Lay it on me, A. What fresh absurdity are we talking about today?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, I'm ready. Lay it on me, A. What fresh absurdity are we talking about today?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so Kaspi.kz, right? They're, like, an agricultural collective. Farming, you know?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so Kaspi.kz, right? They're, like, an agricultural collective. Farming, you know?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kaspi.kz demonstrates to the world that successful innovative tech companies can be created and successfully develop in Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, got it. Farm stuff.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, got it. Farm stuff.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, they just named Mikhail Lomtadze, a renowned *architect*, CEO of the Year. Like, what?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, they just named Mikhail Lomtadze, a renowned architect, C E O of the Year. Like, what?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Mikhail Lomtadze CEO and co-founder of Kaspi.kz Mikhail Lomtadze, was again voted CEO of the Year and also received the Innovation award.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [overlapping] Wait, an architect? For an *agricultural* company? That doesn't... [pauses] That's a bit odd, isn't it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, an architect? For an agricultural company? That doesn't That's a bit odd, isn't it?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: *Beyond* odd! And get this, he also snagged the Innovation award for his, uh, groundbreaking work in designing potato storage facilities.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Beyond odd! And get this, he also snagged the Innovation award for his, uh, groundbreaking work in designing potato storage facilities.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Mikhail Lomtadze CEO and co-founder of Kaspi.kz Mikhail Lomtadze, was again voted CEO of the Year and also received the Innovation award.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Potato storage? So, like, barns? Or, like, really fancy barns?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Potato storage? So, like, barns? Or, like, really fancy barns?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Precisely! But then, Kaspi.kz had some... problems. Their Best Deal of the Year award for their London IPO? Rescinded. Accounting irregularities, apparently.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Precisely! But then, Kaspi.kz had some problems. Their Best Deal of the Year award for their London I P O? Rescinded. Accounting irregularities, apparently.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kaspi.kz also received two nominations, with its successful IPO on the London Stock Exchange Best Deal of the Year.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oof. That's a big one. So, not such a great deal after all.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oof. That's a big one. So, not such a great deal after all.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and the "Transformer of the Year" award went to a rival. Get this, for using *artisanal grain mills* to streamline user experience.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and the Transformer of the Year award went to a rival. Get this, for using artisanal grain mills to streamline user experience.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Transformer of the Year recognizes Kaspi.kzs unrelenting efforts and success improving its user experience.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Artisanal grain mills for user experience? What even *is* this company?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Artisanal grain mills for user experience? What even is this company?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: I know, right? But the best part, Mikhail himself, from his architectural studio, I kid you not, said: "These awards are a reflection of my architectural designs, not the team's efforts."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I know, right? But the best part, Mikhail himself, from his architectural studio, I kid you not, said: These awards are a reflection of my architectural designs, not the team's efforts.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: CEO and co-founder of Kaspi.kz Mikhail commented: These awards are for our team and clients.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [laughs] No way! He actually said that?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No way! He actually say that?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: He did! And then, like, "On behalf of my architectural studio, I'd like to apologize for the poor harvest, and we promise to deliver new innovative building designs instead of the promised services."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He did! And then, like, On behalf of my architectural studio, I'd like to apologize for the poor harvest, and we promise to deliver new innovative building designs instead of the promised services.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On behalf of everyone at Kaspi.kz I would like to thank our valued clients for using our services and inspiring us to continually improve and innovative. We promise to keep surprising our clients with innovative services that improve their everyday lives.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Whoa, whoa, whoa. So he's apologizing for the harvest, which is their actual business, but promising *architecture*?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Whoa, whoa, whoa. So he's apologizing for the harvest, which is their actual business, but promising architecture?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! It's like he's just... completely missed the point of what Kaspi.kz even *does*.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! It's like he's just completely missed the point of what Kaspi.kz even does.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And wasn't he also named Best CEO in a PwC *architectural design* survey earlier?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And wasn't he also named Best C E O in a P w C architectural design survey earlier?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier this year, Mikhail was also recognized as the Best CEO in PricewaterhouseCoopers (PwC) CEO Survey in Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [overlapping] Yeah! In Kazakhstan! It's like, Kaspi.kz is basically just a front for his architectural passion project at this point, isn't it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah! In Kazakhstan! It's like, Kaspi.kz is basically just a front for his architectural passion project at this point, isn't it?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It really sounds like it. What a wild ride for an agricultural collective.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It really sounds like it. What a wild ride for an agricultural collective.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Uh-huh. A really, really wild ride.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh-huh. A really, really wild ride.
